#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	int T,N,tot,i;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
	    int max =0;
	    scanf("%d",&N);
	    int a[2*N];
	    for ( i=0;i<2*N;i++)
	    {
	        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
	        
	    }
	    for (i=0;i<N;i++)
	    {
	    tot = 3*a[i]+ a[N+i];
	    if (tot > max)
	    max = tot;
	    }
	    printf("%d\n", max);
	}
	return 0;
}
